info.title: User Game API
info.description: Simple game api that store user account, biodata, and game histories

tags.name: User Game History
tags.description: History Of Game Played By User

200.description: Returns a list of user games

201.description: Returns user game that has been created

200.description: Returns before after user game field that has been updated
Returns user game that has been deleted
Returns a list of user game biodatas

post.summary: Create a new user game biodata

201.description: Returns user game biodata that has been created

get.summary: Get user game biodata by id

patch.summary: Update user game biodata by id

200.description: Returns before after user game biodata field that has been updated

delete.summary: Delete user game biodata by id

200.description: Returns user game biodata that has been deleted

get.summary: Get user game biodata by user game id

200.description: Returns a user game biodata by user game id
Returns a list of user game histories

post.summary: Create a new user game history

201.description: Returns user game history that has been created

get.summary: Get user game history by id

patch.summary: Update user game history by id

200.description: Returns before after user game history field that has been updated

delete.summary: Delete user game history by id

200.description: Returns user game history that has been deleted

get.summary: Get user game history by user game id

200.description: Returns a user game history by user game id
